description:
> ### What about 'inline' lists? > > For inline lists use the [InlineList](InlineList) component. `` accepts only `` as a child. ```js --- type: example ---
List item 1 List item 2 List item 3 List item 1 List item 2 List item 3 Canvas by Instructure Bridge by Instructure Arc by Instructure
``` ### Adding a delimiter The `delimiter` lets you set a separator between items of the list. The predefined options are ['none', 'solid', and 'dashed']. ```js --- type: example ---
{lorem.sentence()} {lorem.sentence()} {lorem.sentence()} {lorem.sentence()} {lorem.sentence()} {lorem.sentence()} {lorem.sentence()} {lorem.sentence()} {lorem.sentence()}
``` ### Sizing The `size` prop lets you adjust the font-size of the List. The predefined values are aligned with other components that use a 'size' prop for overall consistency within your application. The default is 'medium'. ```javascript --- type: example ---
{lorem.sentence()} Small Size Due: Oct 1, 2019 {lorem.sentence()} Medium (default) Size Due: Oct 1, 2019 {lorem.sentence()} Large Size Due: Oct 1, 2019
``` ### Adding predefined space between each List.Item Use the `itemSpacing` prop to add space around your listâ€™s items. To avoid unwanted excess space at the start/end of a List, the first and last List.Item will not receive margin via the `itemSpacing` prop. > NOTE: itemSpacing has no affect on an List.Item that has the `delimiter` prop set to anything other than **none**. ```js --- type: example --- {lorem.sentence()} Due: Oct 1, 2019 itemSpacing has been set to xx-small ``` **itemSpacing** set to `medium` ```js --- type: example --- {lorem.sentence()} Due: Oct 1, 2019 itemSpacing has been set to medium ``` **itemSpacing** set to `x-large` ```js --- type: example --- {lorem.sentence()} Due: Oct 1, 2019 itemSpacing has been set to x-large ``` List.Items also accept the same `margin` prop as List, in the event you need different spacing around certain List.Items in the List. ```js --- type: example --- Canvas by Instructure Bridge by Instructure Arc by Instructure ```
title: List__README
